notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.H. designed and performed all experiments that address anti-HIV activities and cell safety and of synthetic compounds, M.R. designed and guided the synthesis of the derivative compounds, S.M.H. and T.W. performed proteomics analysis, A.K. and A.B. investigated compound effects on HIV expression, M.S. established the HIV-PCR assays, R.B.-W. (principal investigator) conceived and designed experiments and was responsible for finalizing the manuscript.
